name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 此課程為研究所初級課程，主要以三個方面介紹線性規劃：數學模型建立、演算法與原理、對偶理論及敏感度分析。
schedule:
1. Introduction of optimization models
2. Linear Programming Modeling
3. Integer and Combinatorial Models
4. Geometry and Algebra of Linear Programming
5. Simplex Method,
6. Duality and Sensitivity Analysis
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments:　　　　40%
Mid-term Exams: 　　　　30%
Final Exam (Term Paper):　　30%
